trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for the <c>ThisAddIn</c> class in application-level add-ins that you create by using Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 为使用 Visual Studio 创建的应用程序级外接程序中的 <c>ThisAddIn</c> 类提供基类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase> class provides functionality that is shared by all add-ins that you create by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase>类提供由所有外接程序通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建共享的功能。

trans-unit.source: The `ThisAddIn` class in add-in projects derives most of its members from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase> class.
trans-unit.target: `ThisAddIn`在外接程序项目中的类派生其大多数成员从<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase>类。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[VSTO 外接程序编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md)。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: You cannot create <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase> host items programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 无法创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase>以编程方式主机项。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the `ThisAddIn` class that is automatically created in your add-in project.
trans-unit.target: 请改用`ThisAddIn`外接程序项目中自动创建的类。

trans-unit.source: The `ThisAddIn` class derives from <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase>.
trans-unit.target: `ThisAddIn` 类派生自 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[VSTO 外接程序编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddIn" /> object that this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase" /> object extends.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddIn" /> 对象扩展的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase" /> object extends.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase" /> 对象扩展的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase> class extends <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddIn> objects by implementing the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.IAddInExtension> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase>类扩展<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddIn>对象通过实现<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.IAddInExtension>接口。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that implements the <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility</c> interface.
trans-unit.target: 返回实现 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility</c> 接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility</c> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility</c> 接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to provide the Microsoft Office application an implementation of the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface, or if you have multiple Ribbons in your project and you want to specify which Ribbons to display at run time.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以提供的 Microsoft Office 应用程序的实现`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`接口，或如果你有多个功能区中你的项目，并且你想要指定运行时在显示的功能区。

trans-unit.source: You do not have to override this method to return Ribbons that you add to the project by using the **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item template.
trans-unit.target: 无需重写此方法以返回你使用添加到项目的功能区**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项模板。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method returns a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonManager> object that represents all **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** items in the project.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此方法返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonManager>对象，表示所有**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项目中的项。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: You must override the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.RequestService%2A> method to return Ribbons in your project that you add by using the **Ribbon (XML)** item template.
trans-unit.target: 必须重写<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A>或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.RequestService%2A>方法以返回你使用添加的项目中的功能区**功能区 (XML)**项模板。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to override the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A> method, see [Ribbon XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何重写<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A>方法，请参阅[功能区 XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to override the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.RequestService%2A> method, see [Customizing UI Features By Using Extensibility Interfaces](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何重写<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.RequestService%2A>方法，请参阅[UI 功能通过使用扩展性接口自定义](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension" /> objects to the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension" /> 对象的数组返回给 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The objects represent the Ribbons to display at run time.
trans-unit.target: 表示“功能区”要显示运行时间的对象。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension" /> objects that represent the Ribbons to display at run time.
trans-unit.target: 表示运行时显示的功能区的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the default implementation of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A> method of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase> class when the project contains **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** items.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现调用此方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase>类在该项目包含**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you want to specify which Ribbons to display at run time.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要指定功能区显示在运行时，重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also override the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A> method to specify which Ribbons to display at run time.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以替代<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A>方法，以指定运行时在显示的功能区。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.ICachedDataProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.ICachedDataProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase" /> 占用的资源。

trans-unit.source: Do not call the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.Dispose%2A> method yourself.
trans-unit.target: 不要调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.Dispose%2A>方法自己。

trans-unit.source: When the add-in is unloaded, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] cleans up all resources used by the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 外接程序卸载时，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]清理外接程序使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.Dispose%2A> method, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.Dispose%2A>方法，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213)。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.IHostItemProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.IHostItemProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: To run code just before the add-in is unloaded, add code to the `ThisAddIn_Shutdown` method in the `ThisAddIn` class.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行代码，该外接程序卸载前，将代码添加到`ThisAddIn_Shutdown`中的方法`ThisAddIn`类。

trans-unit.source: This method is a default event handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.Shutdown> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是默认事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.Shutdown>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Office 项目中的事件](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `ThisAddIn` class, see [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`ThisAddIn`类，请参阅[VSTO 外接程序编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md)。

trans-unit.source: To run code when the add-in is loaded, add code to the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method in the `ThisAddIn` class.
trans-unit.target: 若要在加载外接程序时运行代码，将代码添加到`ThisAddIn_Startup`中的方法`ThisAddIn`类。

trans-unit.source: This method is a default event handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.Startup> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是默认事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.Startup>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Office 项目中的事件](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `ThisAddIn` class, see [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`ThisAddIn`类，请参阅[VSTO 外接程序编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object in your add-in that can be used by other solutions.
trans-unit.target: 返回您的外接程序中可以供其他解决方案使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that you want to expose to other solutions.
trans-unit.target: 要向其他解决方案公开的对象。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to expose an object in your add-in to other solutions.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以公开外接程序向其他解决方案中的对象。

trans-unit.source: This includes other add-ins and document-level customizations running in the same application process, VBA code, and external automation code.
trans-unit.target: 这包括其他外接程序和文档级自定义项中的相同应用程序进程，VBA 代码和外部的自动化代码运行。

trans-unit.source: The object that you return must be public, it must be visible to COM, and it must expose the [IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5) interface.
trans-unit.target: 返回的对象必须是公共的它必须是对于 COM 可见，并且必须公开[IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5)接口。

trans-unit.source: If the object you return does not meet these requirements, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] will throw an <xref:System.InvalidCastException> after it calls your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回的对象不满足这些要求，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]将引发<xref:System.InvalidCastException>后调用您的实现。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Calling Code in VSTO Add-ins from Other Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/calling-code-in-vsto-add-ins-from-other-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[调用 VSTO 外接程序从其他 Office 解决方案中的代码](/visualstudio/vsto/calling-code-in-vsto-add-ins-from-other-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates how to override the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.RequestComAddInAutomationService%2A> method, see [Walkthrough: Calling Code in a VSTO Add-in from VBA](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-calling-code-in-a-vsto-add-in-from-vba.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例演示如何重写<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.RequestComAddInAutomationService%2A>方法，请参阅[演练： 在 VSTO 外接程序中从 VBA 调用代码](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-calling-code-in-a-vsto-add-in-from-vba.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that identifies an extensibility interface that is supported by Microsoft Office applications.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，用于标识 Microsoft Office 应用程序支持的扩展性接口。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that extends a feature in a Microsoft Office application.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个对象，该对象可扩展 Microsoft Office 应用程序中的一个功能。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the extensibility interface that is identified by <paramref name="serviceGuid" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，可实现由 <paramref name="serviceGuid" /> 标识的扩展性接口。

trans-unit.source: Override this method in an application-level add-in to implement an extensibility interface that extends a feature in a Microsoft Office application.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法在应用程序级外接程序来实现扩展性接口来扩展 Microsoft Office 应用程序中的功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Customizing UI Features By Using Extensibility Interfaces](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[UI 功能通过使用扩展性接口自定义](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md)。

trans-unit.source: When you override this method, check the value of the `serviceGuid` parameter to determine which extensibility interface is being requested, and then return an object that implements the interface.
trans-unit.target: 当你重写此方法时，检查的值`serviceGuid`参数，以确定正在请求的扩展性接口，，然后返回实现该接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: When your add-in is loaded, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.RequestService%2A> one or more times for each interface that is supported by the application, and it sends the return value to the Microsoft Office application that is loading your add-in.
trans-unit.target: 加载外接程序后，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.RequestService%2A>由应用程序、 支持的每个接口的一个或多个时间和它将返回的值发送到的 Microsoft Office 应用程序加载外接程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the load process of add-ins, see [Architecture of VSTO Add-ins](/visualstudio/vsto/architecture-of-vsto-add-ins.md).
trans-unit.target: 外接程序加载过程的详细信息，请参阅[体系结构的 VSTO 外接程序](/visualstudio/vsto/architecture-of-vsto-add-ins.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you are customizing the Ribbon UI by creating your own implementation of the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface or by adding a **Ribbon (XML)** item to your project, you can alternatively override the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A> method instead of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.RequestService%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你通过自定义功能区用户界面创建您自己的实现`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`接口或通过添加**功能区 (XML)**项到你的项目，或者可以替代<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A>而不是方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.RequestService%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md) and [Ribbon XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md)和[功能区 XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md)。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates how to implement an extensibility interface and override the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.RequestService%2A> method, see [Customizing UI Features By Using Extensibility Interfaces](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例演示如何实现扩展性接口，并重写<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.RequestService%2A>方法，请参阅[UI 功能通过使用扩展性接口自定义](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the add-in is about to be unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 当外接程序即将卸载时发生。

trans-unit.source: Use the default <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.Shutdown> event handler in the `ThisAddIn` class, instead of creating your own event handler for this event.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.Shutdown>中的事件处理程序`ThisAddIn`类，而不是创建您自己的事件处理程序此事件。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.Shutdown> event handler is named `ThisAddIn_Shutdown`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.Shutdown>事件处理程序命名为`ThisAddIn_Shutdown`。

trans-unit.source: In Outlook 2010, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.Shutdown> event is not raised when Outlook exits.
trans-unit.target: 在 Outlook 2010 中，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.Shutdown>当 Outlook 退出时不引发事件。

trans-unit.source: However, this event is raised when the user disables the add-in by using the **COM Add-ins** dialog box in Outlook.
trans-unit.target: 但是，将引发此事件，当用户禁用外接程序使用**COM 外接**在 Outlook 中的对话框。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Office 项目中的事件](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `ThisAddIn` class, see [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`ThisAddIn`类，请参阅[VSTO 外接程序编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the add-in is loaded, after all the initialization code in the assembly has run.
trans-unit.target: 在加载外接程序、且程序集中的所有初始化代码都已运行时发生。

trans-unit.source: Use the default <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.Startup> event handler in the `ThisAddIn` class, instead of creating your own event handler for this event.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.Startup>中的事件处理程序`ThisAddIn`类，而不是创建您自己的事件处理程序此事件。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.Startup> event handler is named `ThisAddIn_Startup`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.Startup>事件处理程序命名为`ThisAddIn_Startup`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about, see [Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Office 项目中的事件](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `ThisAddIn` class, see [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`ThisAddIn`类，请参阅[VSTO 外接程序编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md)。
